events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position, including their resume and cover letter detailing their development experience.
The application has been reviewed and categorised under Engineering due to keywords such as engineer, developer, and software present in the candidate’s submitted documents.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidate’s recruitment process and next steps.
The candidate has been screened via phone call to assess their technical skills and overall fit for the software developer position.
Candidate responded positively to the screening feedback and expressed enthusiasm about the opportunity to proceed with the technical interview.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the engineering team for the candidate on 2024-05-14 at 10:00 AM to evaluate their development skills.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong coding abilities and problem-solving skills relevant to the engineer role.
An HR interview has been scheduled for the candidate to discuss cultural fit, company values, and employment terms on 2024-05-16 at 2:00 PM.
The HR interview was completed with positive feedback; the candidate aligned well with company culture and expectations.
An official job offer has been sent to the candidate outlining salary, benefits, and starting date for the software engineer position.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and conveyed excitement about joining the engineering team.
The candidate has formally accepted the job offer to join as a software engineer, confirming their start date and onboarding schedule.
The candidate’s onboarding process has officially commenced, including setting up accounts, introductions to the team, and initial training sessions.
The hiring process is now complete and the candidate has successfully transitioned to an active member of the engineering team.
